solution_line_template: On Monday, he spent half of ${initial_money} leaving him with ${initial_money}-({monday_fraction})*${initial_money} = $<<{initial_money}-({monday_fraction})*{initial_money}={money_after_monday}>>{money_after_monday}

On Tuesday, he spent {tuesday_fraction}th of ${money_after_monday} leaving ${money_after_monday}-({tuesday_fraction})*{money_after_monday} = $<<{money_after_monday}-({tuesday_fraction})*{money_after_monday}={money_after_tuesday}>>{money_after_tuesday}
On Wednesday, he spent {wednesday_fraction}ths of ${money_after_tuesday} leaving ${money_after_tuesday}-({wednesday_fraction})*${money_after_tuesday} = ${money_after_wednesday}
